spec: Build Spring Boot GraphQL API for entity 'Employee' with fields id:long, name:string, role:string. Add DataLoader batching and unit tests.
Generate Django REST Framework endpoints for entity 'Customer' (id:int, name:str, email:EmailStr). Use PostgreSQL, serializers, viewsets, and page-number pagination.
Create Quarkus REST CRUD for entity 'InventoryItem' (id:long, sku:string, quantity:int). Use Panache ORM, H2 dev DB, and validation.
Build a Flask API + CLI to manage 'Todo' items (id:int, title:str, completed:bool). Store in a JSON file; include Marshmallow schemas and unit tests.
Implement Spring Boot WebSocket chat service with endpoint '/chat' using STOMP. Provide simple in-memory room registry and JUnit 5 tests.
Create FastAPI file upload/download service for 'File' (id:str, filename:str, size:int, checksum:str). Save to local disk; compute checksum in background tasks.
Build Spring Boot REST for entity 'Article' (id:long, title:string, content:string, createdAt:Instant). Support pagination and sorting with Pageable.
Generate SQLAlchemy models and FastAPI endpoints for 'Invoice' (id:int, amount:Decimal, issued_at:datetime, paid:bool). Use PostgreSQL and Alembic migrations.
Create Spring Boot CRUD for 'Customer' with MapStruct DTO mapping and Lombok. Use H2 database and validation constraints.
Build Flask JWT auth (login/register) securing CRUD for 'Account' (id:int, username:str, email:str). Use SQLite and Swagger docs via flasgger.
Implement Micronaut service calling external REST API using HttpClient with Resilience4j circuit breaker and caching. Provide config via application.yml.
Create FastAPI WebSocket notifications for 'StockPrice' (symbol:str, price:float, timestamp:datetime). Broadcast to all clients; include heartbeat pings.
Build Spring Batch job to import CSV into 'User' table (id:long, name:string, email:string). Schedule with @Scheduled and write to H2 using JPA.
Generate SQLAlchemy models and service layer for 'OrderItem' (id:int, order_id:int, product_id:int, quantity:int). Provide FastAPI endpoints and pytest unit tests.
Create Spring Boot CRUD for 'Department' (id:long, name:string) with MySQL, JPA, and Flyway migrations. Add global exception handling.
Build FastAPI CRUD using Depends-based DI for 'Project' (id:int, name:str, owner:str, status:Literal). Use SQLite; add filtering by status.
Generate Quarkus gRPC service 'Greeter' with SayHello method, protobuf definitions, and RestAssured tests. Package with Maven.
Create Django Channels chat app for 'Room' (id:int, name:str). Use Redis channel layer, login-required rooms, and basic tests.
Implement Spring Boot OAuth2 Resource Server securing 'Order' endpoints with JWT. Provide test configuration and sample curl commands.
Build FastAPI image-processing endpoint using Pillow for 'ImageJob' (id:uuid, path:str, status:Literal). Use Celery + Redis for background tasks.
Create Micronaut Kafka producer/consumer for 'Event' (id:uuid, type:string, payload:json). Configure serializers and include integration tests.
Generate Flask RESTful API with Marshmallow schemas for 'Employee' (id:int, name:str, salary:float). SQLite persistence and custom error handlers.
Expose Spring Data REST repositories for 'Book' with custom search endpoints, projections, and HATEOAS links.
Create Typer CLI to scaffold a new package (name:str, author:str). Generate pyproject.toml, virtualenv instructions, and unit tests.
Build Spring Boot S3 file service for 'Document' (id:long, key:string, url:string). Use AWS SDK v2, upload/download endpoints, and config via env vars.
Implement FastAPI multi-tenant CRUD for 'Note' (id:int, body:str) using header 'X-Tenant'. Separate SQLite DB files per tenant and middleware for routing.
Create Quarkus REST CRUD for 'Invoice' (id:long, number:string, amount:BigDecimal) with Panache + Postgres and RestAssured tests.
Build Django app with Celery periodic task to purge stale sessions. Provide management command and unit tests.
Implement Spring WebFlux reactive endpoints for 'SensorReading' (id:long, sensorId:string, value:double, timestamp:Instant). Use R2DBC Postgres.
Generate FastAPI CRUD using SQLModel for 'Customer' (id:int, name:str, balance:Decimal). Include list filtering and pytest fixtures.
Create Micronaut service reading/writing 'CacheItem' (key:string, value:string, ttl:int) from Redis. Provide Dockerfile and JUnit tests.
Build Flask + SocketIO real-time notifications for 'OrderStatus' (order_id:int, status:str, at:datetime). Include client example and acknowledgements.
Generate Spring Boot REST for 'Product' (id:long, name:string, tags:List<string>) using JPA, MapStruct, Lombok, and validation groups.
Create asyncio-based web fetcher that loads URLs and extracts <title> into model 'FetchResult' (url:str, status:int, title:str). Provide logging and retries.
Implement Spring Boot scheduled job to fetch weather from external API and store 'Weather' (city:string, temp:double, fetchedAt:Instant) in DB.
Create FastAPI server-sent events stream for 'LogEvent' (id:int, message:str, ts:datetime). Provide client example and graceful shutdown.
Build Quarkus REST 'HelloResource' and configure native image build. Include Dockerfile and health endpoints.
Generate Flask REST app with Blueprints for 'Ticket' (id:int, subject:str, status:str, priority:int). Add OpenAPI docs and error handling.
Create Spring Security basic auth for CRUD endpoints over 'Report' (id:long, name:string, createdAt:Instant). Define roles ADMIN and USER.
Implement FastAPI OAuth2 password flow with JWT and refresh tokens for 'Account' (id:int, username:str, password_hash:str). Include revoke and rotate logic.
Build Spring Boot JPA one-to-many between 'Author' and 'Book' with DTOs, services, and controllers. Include cascade rules and tests.
Create FastAPI CRUD using Motor (MongoDB async) for 'Log' (id:ObjectId, level:str, message:str, ts:datetime). Add indexes and query by level/time.
Generate Micronaut REST for 'Customer' with OpenAPI/Swagger annotations, validation, and integration tests.
Build CSV-to-SQLite loader using pandas for 'Sale' (id:int, sku:str, amount:Decimal, sold_at:datetime). Provide CLI and simple API endpoints.
Implement Spring Boot integration tests with Testcontainers (PostgreSQL) for 'Order' CRUD. Include schema, repository, service, controller layers.
